settings.label: BOOST WELLNESS PATCHES
settings.h1: Renew, Rest, Repair with Natural Patches

settings.title: Clean Wellness
settings.paragraph: Natural health patches are infused with natural, plant-based nutraceuticals and vitamins that are released to boost your energy, mood, and recovery, naturally.

settings.title: Fast Acting
settings.paragraph: Upon application, natural ingredients are absorbed directly by your skin and bypass the digestive system for quicker action and effectiveness.

settings.title: Controlled Release
settings.paragraph: Say goodbye to choking down pills, powders and unnatural energy drinks with nutraceutical skin patches that work steadily throughout the day and night.

settings.title: Made in the USA
settings.paragraph: Boost Patches are formulated and manufactured safely in an FDA registered facility in the USA.

settings.label: NEW!
settings.heading: Boost Your Mood
settings.paragraph: Boost your vibe with a wearable patch infused with natural hemp and aloe extract.
